QuestData.Title: Mottled Hydra Scale
QuestData.Description:
<The scale of a recently-defeated hydra hatchling, it appears to be a mixture of several colors.
There appears to be a battle for dominance between the hydra of the region, one of your new allies may know more.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Mottled Hydra Scale to Finder Palta in Newhome in Nazjatar.
